00161       Repository() {
00162         _collection = 0;
00163         _readOnly = false;
00164         _lastThrashTime = 0;
00165         _thrashing = false;
00166         memset( (void*) _documentLoad, 0, sizeof(indri::atomic::value_type)*LOAD_MINUTES*LOAD_MINUTE_FRACTION );
00167         memset( (void*) _queryLoad, 0, sizeof(indri::atomic::value_type)*LOAD_MINUTES*LOAD_MINUTE_FRACTION );
00168       }
